channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Life Of Pi
channel.desc: Adventure, Fantasy, Drama 2012 Bai Batal tells the story of the storm that hit their ship and how he got rescued, taking a Bengali leopard as a friend to start a new friendship between man and animals. Suraj Sharma, Irrfan Khan, Adil Hussain, Tabu , Ayaan Khan, Ang Lee, Yann Martel, Tabu, David Magee.
